name: Joey Boy
description: '''Apisit Opasaimlikit''' ({{langx|th|อภิสิทธิ์ โอภาสเอี่ยมลิขิต}}, {{RTGS|Aphisit Ophat-iamlikhit}}; born 1974), known by his [[stage name]] '''Joey Boy''' ({{langx|th|โจอี้ บอย}}), is a Thai rapper, singer, songwriter, and television personality, known as the '''Godfather of Thai Hip Hop'''.
